name: Zombie Shooter Game
description:
This is a very simple Zombie Shooter game. Hope you enjoy!

Controls:

WASD - move

SPACE - shoot

LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS - rotate

Zombie Shooter Game v4.16.17

** CHANGELOG **

- Minor Bug Fixes

- Zombies Spawn Randomly Around Player

Zombie Shooter Game v4.6.17

** CHANGELOG **

- Added better randomization

- Fixed OpenGL 4.5 Windows Black Textures Bug

- Made movement better
